articles.title: JFK's former Georgetown home where he lived for two years with his sister sells for $4.2million - Daily Mail
articles.description: The former president lived in the three-bedroom home with his sister, Eunice, from 1949 to 1951. He met his eventual bride at a dinner party nearby in May 1951.
articles.content:
President John F. Kennedy's Georgetown residence, where he lived when he met Jacqueline Bouvier, his future wife, has sold for $4.2million.
